Text: Tnx alex for keeping us updated. Respect.

commenting to say that this works (again).

but this is still not a TRUE crack, it's more like a temporary bypass. and this is going to be an endless cycle (update-bypass-update-bypass-etc) until someone actually creates a crack of the game .exe itself that ignores the UpLauncher.

someone needs to figure out how to stop UpLauncher from checking the game files offline. someone needs to make it so that we can start the game from TDU2.exe directly instead of having to use the Launcher.
maybe you shuold give it a try caspianseez.
